mapper.select: SELECT serve.id, serve.sale_status, serve.serve_item_id, item.name AS serve_item_name, item.serve_type_id, serve.region_id, item.reference_price, serve.price, serve.is_hot, serve.create_time, serve.update_time, type.name AS serve_type_name FROM serve inner JOIN serve_item AS item ON serve.serve_item_id = item.id inner JOIN serve_type AS type ON item.serve_type_id = type.id WHERE serve.region_id = #{regionId}

SELECT type.id serve_type_id, serve.city_code, type.serve_type_icon, type.sort_num serve_type_sort_num, type.name serve_type_name, item.sort_num serve_item_sort_num, item.name serve_item_name, item.id serve_item_id, item.serve_item_icon, serve.id serve_id
FROM serve inner JOIN serve_item AS item ON serve.serve_item_id = item.id inner JOIN serve_type AS type ON item.serve_type_id = type.id WHERE serve.region_id = #{regionId} and serve.sale_status = 2 order by serve_type_sort_num, serve_item_sort_num

select type.id serve_type_id, type.img serve_type_img, type.sort_num serve_type_sort_num, type.name serve_type_name
from serve inner join serve_item as item on serve.serve_item_id = item.id inner join serve_type as type on item.serve_type_id = type.id where serve.region_id = #{regionId} and serve.sale_status = 2 group by type.id

select serve.id, item.id serve_item_id, item.name serve_item_name, item.img serve_item_img, item.unit, serve.price, item.img detail_img, serve.city_code
from serve inner join serve_item as item on serve.serve_item_id = item.id inner join serve_type as type on item.serve_type_id = type.id where serve.region_id = #{regionId} and serve.sale_status = 2 and serve.is_hot = 1 order by item.create_time desc

select serve.id, item.id serve_item_id, item.name serve_item_name, item.img serve_item_img, item.unit, serve.price, item.img detail_img, serve.city_code
from serve inner join serve_item as item on serve.serve_item_id = item.id where serve.region_id = #{regionId} and serve_item_id = #{serveItemId} and serve.sale_status = 2
